title: Problem with last ranked game
body: I won my last ranked game but after I clicked Continue I got stuck in the reconnect window as if I had left the game and when I clicked reconnect it would give me some error and options to retry or cancel. It stayed like that for 5 hours even after I restarted the client and the pc but it's now resolved and I can login normally but the game wont show up in my match history and I have not won LP off of it. Am I going to get my LP?

replies.body: It looks like you may have experiences a ghost game.  When a match ends, the completion needs to be communicated to our server, otherwise you may be stuck at the reconnect until it's done.  Usually, a relog can force that communication.  If it's taken so long, I can't guarantee that the match will be saved to the server.  Hopefully, it will show up on your history!
